mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_INTERF_LOG_INFO (INTERF_NAME, URL, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, ORDER_NO, ID, REMARK, UPDATE_DATE, RETURN_CONTENT) VALUES (#{interfName}, #{url}, #{content}, sysdate, #{orderNo}, SEQ_GOM_BDW_INTERF_LOG_INFO.NEXTVAL, #{remark}, sysdate, #{returnContent})

INSERT INTO GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO (attr_info_id, srv_ord_id, attr_action, attr_code, attr_name, attr_value, attr_value_name, create_date, sourse) VALUES (SEQ_GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO.nextval,#{srvOrdId},#{attrAction},#{attrCode},#{attrName}, #{attrValue},#{attrValueName},sysdate,#{sourse})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOM_BDW_SRV_ORD_ATTR_INFO WHERE SRV_ORD_ID = #{srvOrdId} AND ATTR_ACTION=#{interfaceName}
